item.title: Carlos Alcaraz wins his 2nd U.S. Open at match delayed by Trump's attendance
item.description: The president's arrival delayed the match and left many ticketholders waiting in line. He watched from Rolex's luxury box.

item.title: More than 90,000 Jeep Grand Cherokees recalled over potential loss of drive power
item.description: Vehicles impacted by the recall include 2022 to 2026 plug-in hybrid electric models of the Jeep Grand Cherokee.

item.title: Trump walks back Chicago 'war' threat, but vows to 'clean up' cities
item.description: Trump posted online that Chicago was "about to find out why it's called the Department of WAR," but later said his administration wouldn't go to war w...

item.title: Postal traffic to US drops more than 80% after trade exemption rule ends, UN agency says
item.description: The de minimis rule that allowed small packages worth less than $800 to be exempt from tariffs ended on Friday, Aug. 29, 2025.

item.title: Colombia's lone Amazon port faces drying river and rising tensions with Peru
item.description: Colombia's only Amazon port town could soon be cut off from the river that keeps it alive. As drought and a shifting river spark a tense border disput...
